name: Hit Hider Dark Theme
description:
Dark theme for the "Google Hit Hider" script here >> https://openuserjs.org/scripts/jscher2000/Google_Hit_Hider_by_Domain_%28Search_Filter_Block_Sites%29 <<, mainly to match with these following themes:
https://userstyles.org/styles/109717/google-search-material-design

Enjoy!
